ygData.subject: Re: Selling to Krak?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If sneak got him to indifferent, then yes he was behind him. The /con message from sneak changes based on whether you re in front or behind. -- John H. Kim
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 3 Feb 2000, Rokenn Swiftsong wrote:
>
> Aviak's have no faction so are immune to Carillon. Sounds like they have
> have fixed the sneak/sell bug. Where you behind him when you tried to sell?
>
> >dubious, and did not change his response. With sneak I got him to
> >indifferent, but he still wouldn't sell. His response was different,

If sneak got him to indifferent, then yes he was behind him.
The /con message from sneak changes based on whether you're in
front or behind.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
